title: What is the Advanced Course in Non-Verbal Hypnosis and Ecstasy Therapy?

last_phrase: In conclusion, these exercises and techniques provide practical methods for healing various physical and emotional problems through magnetism, hypnosis, and non-verbal communication. The use of fluidification and opposite points can stimulate the parasympathetic system, leading to a sense of wellbeing, while the human pendulum test can stimulate unconscious answers to assist with therapy.
